titleStmt.title: By the maior. The order of the House of Commons to the Lord Maior, for the due observing the Sabbath day.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Gurney, Richard, Sir, 1577-1647.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: The proclamation of the House of Commons is dated and signed: "This thirteenth of April, 1641. Mitchel.".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
